definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Beyond that gunshot there’s no evidence.
sentences.chinese: 除了枪声之外，就没有任何证据了。

sentences.english: He waited until he heard shots. Then he peered through the skylight, into the darkened tavern.
sentences.chinese: 他等到枪声响起，才透过天窗朝阴暗的酒馆内看去。

sentences.english: Dingee heard the firing becoming more sporadic.
sentences.chinese: 迪丹吉听到枪声变得越来越零散。

sentences.english: The gunshot started three birds at one time.
sentences.chinese: 枪声一下子把三只鸟给惊飞了。

sentences.english: Gunfire could still be heard sporadically.
On hearing the gunfire, everyone faced down instinctively.
sentences.chinese: 听到枪声，大家都本能地趴下来。

sentences.english: Gunfire shocked the chief commander Liu Xunde guard.
sentences.chinese: 枪声惊动了司令长官刘勋德的卫队。

sentences.english: Suddenly, he started back at the report of fire-arms .
sentences.chinese: 忽然，枪声起处，他朝后打了个趔趄。

sentences.english: THERE was no return of the mutineers - not so much as another shot out of the woods.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者们没有卷土重来，树林中再也没听到枪声。

sentences.english: Later, as night fell over the tumultuous capital, gunfire could be heard in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 随后，夜幕降临骚乱的首都，远处传来枪声。

sentences.english: A shot rang out and galvanized the patrol into action.
sentences.chinese: 枪声一响，使得巡逻兵们立即行动起来。

sentences.english: I heard gunshots, Eben . What the hell is going on?
sentences.chinese: 我听到枪声，到底是怎么回事？

sentences.english: The sound of guns violate the usual calm of Sunday mornin.
sentences.chinese: 枪声破坏了星期日早晨向来的宁静。

sentences.english: The mountains echoed back the noise of the shot.
sentences.chinese: 从山那边传来了枪声的回响。

sentences.english: S. Navy said the boat then heard gunshots inside the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 美国海军称，游艇船舱内部随后传来枪声。

sentences.english: Kirilov's pistol shot will be the signal for the last revolution.
sentences.chinese: 基里洛夫自戕的枪声将是这最后革命的信号。

definition: to open fire/to shoot a gun
to open fire/to shoot a gun
